item.title: Auto-Cast Barrage
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Alright, well I’m just going to start from scratch. Here is the code that I have so far:

[code=java]MageAttackIndex = playerIndexx + 1;

        if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1 && !pl2.protectMage()) {
            if (mageTimer <= 0) {
                AttackMage(playerIndexx);
                mageTimer = 9;
            }
        } else {
            sendMessage(
                    "This player is in a safe zone and cannot be attacked");
        }[/code]

I want an auto caster to be able to do ice barrage. With the ancient staff. What would I have to add/do in order to get this accomplished?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 04:54:40 pm[/size][hr]Anyone?

Read full topic
